title: (x) serif "Kaas - Fromage" - Guardi {Frank S}
content:
Hi everyone,

I’m looking for this font...

don’t know if it’s modified....

Ehm, looks like Cheltnham, but it isn’t...

anybody got a clue?... many, many thanks

Matthijs

author: matthijs van Leeuwen

comments.content: Yes, Guardi (from Adobe) condensed horizontally 75%, I believe. Amazing that it looks so good condensed so much.

wow...

thanks everyone...

The knowledge... the knowledge... the knowledge...

;-) Matthijs
